com.storageroomapp.client

Class CollectionQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.storageroomapp.client.CollectionQuery

  • public class CollectionQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates a Collection query for Entries on the StorageRoom API. Given the complexity and power of the SR API in this area, no attempt was made to make this a real abstraction.

    The members you can set in this class are raw values sent to the SR API on the URL.

    • Field Detail

      • sortFieldName

        public java.lang.String sortFieldName
        Identifier of the field that governs the sort order of the filter. Set to null if no sort order is needed.

      • sortOrder

        public CollectionQuery.SortOrder sortOrder
        The sort direction (ASC, DESC, or NONE)

      • pageSize

        public int pageSize
        Page size of results to bring back from the server. Use -1 to use the default page size.

      • filterOptions

        public java.lang.String filterOptions
        Filter string, or set to null to retrieve all rows. Because StorageRoom has a very rich filtering API, no attempt in this version of the Java API is made to abstract the filtering capabilities. Pass in the raw filtering string as per the docs at: http://storageroomapp.com/documentation#search Examples of this String include: "price!gt=10&price!lt=50" "@trash=true" "location!within=((49.12,9.07),1)" "description!match=/\btest\b/"
